text: Hagi Efraemi vahe'mo'za ne'zama neankna hu'za zahora nene'za, maka kna zage hanati kazigati'ma ea zaho nevaririze. Zamagra havige avu'ava zane, vahe'ma ohe fri ahe fri hu avu'avaza hu'za eri hakare nehaze. Ana nehu'za Asiria vahe'ene eri mago hu'za nemani'za, zamazama hu'zama erisagura olivi masavena atrage'za Isipi eri'za nevaze.
